tool.name: Merge GROMACS topologies
tool.description: for example, for protein and ligand files
tool.command:
ln -s '$top_input' ./top_input.top && #for $itp_input in $itp_inputs ln -s '$itp_input' ./$itp_input.element_identifier && echo '$itp_input.element_identifier' >> ./itps.txt && #end for
python '$__tool_directory__/merge_top.py' top_input.top itps.txt
tool.help: Use this tool to combine GROMACS topologies - for example, the topology files for a ligand and protein.
